record.id: field.name="subscribeMode" and file.name="environment" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: subscribeMode
record.file.name: environment

brief.brief: Use this option to select the way to subscribe to items: via Service Catalog or directly from the Subscription list

detail.detail: The Administrator is able to choose between two Subscription modes - Change Management or Service Catalog
If the value is left empty, it will be defaulted to Service Catalog.

If the mode is set to Service Catalog then users can only subscribe to items through Service Catalog and if the mode is set to Change Management then a Self Service Recording user (SST user) should be able to subscribe or cancel subscriptions to items directly from the Subscription list.
